title: Shitdisco - 2007 - Kingdom Of Fear
description:
Shitdisco - 2007 - Kingdom Of Fear
----------------------------------

01. I Know Kung Fu
02. Reactor Party
03. Disco Blood
04. 72 Virgins
05. Dream of Infinity
06. 3D Sex Show
07. Lover of Others
08. Another
09. OK
10. Fear of the Future

Joel Stone - bass, guitar, vocals
Joe Reeves - bass, guitar, vocals
Darren Cullen - drums
Tom Straughn - keyboards, backing vocals

Shitdisco is a Dance-punk band from Glasgow, Scotland. They were formed in 2003 while studying at the Glasgow School of Art. Their first single Disco Blood/I Know Kung Fu was released in December 2005 and sold out quickly. They are signed to record label Fierce Panda. Shitdisco released their debut album Kingdom Of Fear on the 16 April 2007.
